newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * Prime Minister Victor Ciorbea will brief the leaders of the National Peasant Party on the stage of economic reforms in an executive board meeting on Thursday.
* Romanian and U.S. military ships will participate in a joint military exercise in the Romanian and international waters of the Black Sea under the Partnership for Peace programme.
